name: not like
description:
This is 'not like', a new video game from Outhouse Media. A space-action adventure on the borders of space and time. The game is set in a planet named Alpha Centauri which is filled with intelligent life. Now you will pilot a battleship called the Jump. Along the journey you will discover the mysterious world of Gamma Centauri and acquire new alien technology. The story launches some 8 years after the events of the first game and follows Rolan, a teenager with a flickering vision of an apocalyptic future, as he makes his way to the planet to find his dad and discover his new mission. The result is an exciting, challenging, addictive, challenging game that will take you on a mysterious journey across space and time!
Rolan, a young teenager is on a mission in Gamma Centauri. He is something of a hero and has been one of the heroes of his school. He was awarded with the Intel X-Ray Badge, one of the highest activity badges in the military. The enemy forces on the planet are all evil and they control the environment. Rolan's goal is to eliminate them all. The game is set in a totally new universe where There are now 3 different game modes to choose from the first is the campaign. In the campaign you'll simply explore the alien world facing alien technology and collect resources. The sequel is called Outworld amid which brings us new adversaries. As you progress you will meet new characters and go on quests in different areas. There is also faction-based and linear story mode to explore which will take you
